metadata.name: Clue 4 #1
metadata.description: Light the Night Golden NFT is a collection which is merged by two Premium NFTs and randomly generate a new collection. This new collection exists on the Ethereum Blockchain. The first ever community-participatant puzzle(game) NFT collection which is based on the trending Taiwanese Netflix original series. NFT holders not only own a PFP, the NFTs are also a Metaverse VIP Access that invite holders to participate in more Chinese TV show productions and engage in a long-term drama metaverse community.Visit: [www.lightthenight.io](https://www.lightthenight.io/)
